item.title: Dīvān-i silsilah va al-z̲ahab min ashʻār
notes: Title and author statement on facing pages.

Paper; cream-colored, Middle Eastern laid paper with no chain lines; black ink, section headings in gold and blue ink, 2 columns in blue and gold border; title on folios 1b-2a highly decordated in dark blue and gold; catchwords on rectos.
Date on folio 1a 28 Rabīʻ al-awwal 1246 [16 September 1830].
Nastaʻliq; 16 lines in written area 14.5 x 6.5 cm
Modern leather binding; original nineteenth century red Turkish binding with engraved panels in preservation box with manuscript.
Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
medium: [7], 120, [7] leaves (17 lines) bound : paper ; 23.5 x 14.5 cm
other_title: ديوان سلسلة و ال-ذهب من شسعار /

subject: manuscripts, persian
iran
washington (d.c.)
title: Dīvān-i silsilah va al-z̲ahab min ashʻār
description: Manuscript. Persian. Title from folio 1b. Title and author statement on facing pages. Probably copied in Iran. Paper; cream-colored, Middle Eastern laid paper with no chain lines; black ink, section headings in gold and blue ink, 2 columns in blue and gold border; title on folios 1b-2a highly decordated in dark blue and gold; catchwords on rectos. Date on folio 1a 28 Rabīʻ al-awwal 1246 [16 September 1830]. Nastaʻliq; 16 lines in written area 14.5 x 6.5 cm Folios 1b-120a. Library of Congress. Persian manuscript, 321/53A. Modern leather binding; original nineteenth century red Turkish binding with engraved panels in preservation box with manuscript. Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
other_title: ديوان سلسلة و ال-ذهب من شسعار /
